General.Name: Tarczynski S.A.
General.Description: Tarczynski S.A. processes, produces, distributes, and sells meat products in Poland. It offers kabanos, frankfurters, products for children, protein snacks, cured meats , ham, fillets, and sausages. The company sells its products to retail stores and wholesalers under the TARCZYNSKI brand. Tarczynski S.A. was founded in 1989 and is based in Trzebnica, Poland.
